item.title: Peter Navarro’s Moment
item.description: He finally has the attention of the world, but his over-the-top tariff rhetoric isn’t very convincing.

item.title: The Grand Strategic Folly of a War on Trade
item.description: America was born as a maritime nation and grew to become a hegemon. Our grand strategy can’t and shouldn’t aim at isolation.

item.title: The Illogic of Tariffs Has Turned the Trump Administration into ‘Degrowthers’
item.description: What else could you call the agenda that’s being endorsed?

item.title: Charity Done Right
item.description: While shocking nonprofit chicanery has found itself in the media spotlight, the story of one West Texas charity deserves to be told and to inspire.

item.title: In Fiery Order, Judge Again Tells Trump to Return Illegal Alien Deported to El Salvador
item.description: Prepare for a very loud week.
